title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 365.7 - Retention and timely disposal of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 365.7 - Retention and timely disposal of records

State Regulations

Department records shall be retained and timely disposed of
pursuant to section 186 of the State Finance Law and the regulations
promulgated thereunder, 9 NYCRR
295, paragraph (e) of subdivision 1 of section
94
of the

Public Officers Law and paragraph (b) of subdivision 3 of said
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
365.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
